attributes.action: Keep the Yorkshire Ripper In Prison
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Its does not need much explaining. His release is being considered.
This has to be stopped.
He does not deserve release.
Keep him in Prison.

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
